parameters.name: ConfigId
parameters.description:
The ID of the task configuration.

>  You can call the [DescribeCycleTaskList](~~DescribeCycleTaskList~~) operation to query the IDs of task configurations.

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the task. Valid values:

*   **1**: enables the task.
*   **0**: disables the task.

parameters.name: FirstDateStr
parameters.description: The time when the task first started.

parameters.name: IntervalPeriod
parameters.description: The interval at which the task is run.

parameters.name: PeriodUnit
parameters.description:
The unit of the scan interval. Valid values:

*   **day**
*   **hour**

parameters.name: TargetEndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the task. The time must be a time frame.

parameters.name: TargetStartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the task. The start time must be a time frame.

parameters.name: TaskName
parameters.description:
The name of the task. Valid values:

*   **VIRUS_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: virus detection task
*   **IMAGE_SCAN**: image scan task
*   **EMG_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: urgent vulnerability scan task

Valid values:

*   VIRUS_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    virus detection task

    <!-- -->

*   IMAGE_SCAN

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    image scan task

    <!-- -->

*   EMG_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    urgent vulnerability scan task

    <!-- -->

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description:
The type of the task. Valid values:

*   **VIRUS_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: virus detection task
*   **IMAGE_SCAN**: image scan task
*   **EMG_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN**: urgent vulnerability scan task

Valid values:

*   VIRUS_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    virus detection task

    <!-- -->

*   IMAGE_SCAN

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    image scan task

    <!-- -->

*   EMG_VUL_SCHEDULE_SCAN

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    urgent vulnerability scan task
